languages.text: "Эти порталы... не могу понять, как далеко мы от треклятой арены... надо ли опасаться погони? Можно ли надеяться на исход?"
"These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"
languages.original_text: "Эти порталы... не могу понять, как далеко мы от треклятой арены... надо ли опасаться погони? Можно ли надеяться на исход?"

traits.locale_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"
"These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"
"These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"
"These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

languages.text: “这些传送门……我不知道我们离那座该死的竞技场有多远了……我们该不该担心他们会不会来追杀我们？我们真的能指望找到出路，逃出这个地方吗？”
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: “这些传送门……我不知道我们离那座该死的竞技场有多远了……我们该不该担心他们会不会来追杀我们？我们真的能指望找到出路，逃出这个地方吗？”

languages.text: « Ces portails... Je n'arrive pas à savoir quelle distance nous sépare de l'arène et si on doit s'inquiéter qu'ils se lancent à nos trousses. Avons-nous seulement la moindre chance de nous en sortir ? »
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces portails... Je n'arrive pas à savoir quelle distance nous sépare de l'arène et si on doit s'inquiéter qu'ils se lancent à nos trousses. Avons-nous seulement la moindre chance de nous en sortir ? »

languages.text: «Esos portales... no sé cómo de lejos estamos de esa maldita arena... ¿Debería preocuparme por una posible persecución? ¿Tenemos esperanzas de escapar?».
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: «Esos portales... no sé cómo de lejos estamos de esa maldita arena... ¿Debería preocuparme por una posible persecución? ¿Tenemos esperanzas de escapar?».

languages.text: 「こんなポータルが…忌々しい闘技場から離れてたら見つけられないわね。追っ手の心配をすべきかしら？ここから出られると思っていいわね？」
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなポータルが…忌々しい闘技場から離れてたら見つけられないわね。追っ手の心配をすべきかしら？ここから出られると思っていいわね？」

languages.text: "Diese Portale ... Ich habe keinen Schimmer, wie weit wir von der verfluchten Arena entfernt sind ... Müssen wir Angst haben, dass sie uns verfolgen? Können wir hoffen, zu entkommen?"
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Portale ... Ich habe keinen Schimmer, wie weit wir von der verfluchten Arena entfernt sind ... Müssen wir Angst haben, dass sie uns verfolgen? Können wir hoffen, zu entkommen?"

languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

languages.text: "Bu portallar... Lanetli arenadan ne kadar uzakta olduğumuzu çıkaramıyorum. Peşimizden gelirler mi? Buradan çıkacağımıza ümitlenmeli miyiz?"
languages.original_text: "These portals... I can't figure out how far we are from the damned arena... Should we be worried about them coming after us? Can we hope for a way out of this?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu portallar... Lanetli arenadan ne kadar uzakta olduğumuzu çıkaramıyorum. Peşimizden gelirler mi? Buradan çıkmak için ümitlenmeli miyiz?"
